msg_standard.msg: <3 <USER>, thank you for subbing with <SUBPLAN> Welcome to the channel! <3
msg_standard.info: Message that gets posted when a viewer subscribes to the channel for the first time.

args_info.<USER>: User who subribed to the channel.

msg_with_months.msg: PogChamp <USER>, thank you for subbing with <SUBPLAN> Welcome back for <MONTHS> years! PogChamp
msg_with_months.info: Message that gets posted when a viewer resubscribes to the channel.

args_info.<USER>: User who resubribed to the channel.
args_info.<MONTHS>: Amount of months the user is subscribed to the channel.

msg_standard.msg: PogChamp <DONOR> gifted a <SUBPLAN> sub to <RECIPIENT>! Thanks and welcome to the channel! <3
msg_standard.info: Message that gets posted when a viewer received a donated sub to the channel.

msg_with_months.msg: Kreygasm <DONOR> gifted a <SUBPLAN> sub to <RECIPIENT>! Thanks both of you SeemsGood It is <MONTHS> years already! PogChamp
msg_with_months.info: Message that gets posted when an existing subscriber receive a sub donation to the channel.

args_info.<MONTHS>: Amount of months the user is subscribed to the channel.

new_chatter.info: Message for ritual of new viewer

raid.msg: PogChamp <AMOUNT> raiders from <CHANNEL> PogChamp Chat get ready for defense SMOrc

call_reply.msg: <EMOTE> NOW <EMOTE> THIS <EMOTE> IS <EMOTE> WHAT <EMOTE> I <EMOTE> CALL <EMOTE>
call_reply.info: Reply for '!call'-command. Followed by the text specified by the user.

args_info.<EMOTE>: Emote that gets used in the call command.

mod_added.info: Reply if a mod got added to the trusted mod list.

already_mod.info: Reply if someone tries to add a user who is already on the trusted mod list.

args_info.<USER>: User who is already in the trusted mod list.

mod_deleted.info: Reply if a mod got removed to the trusted mod list.

user_not_in_list.msg: <USER> is not a trusted mod. monkaS
user_not_in_list.info: Reply if someone tries to remove a user who not on the trusted mod list.

args_info.<USER>: User who should be removed from the trusted mod list.

cmd_already_exists.msg: Command already in the list! DansGame
cmd_already_exists.info: Reply if the command is already in the list.

cmd_added.info: Reply if the command has been added to the list.

args_info.<COMMAND>: Command that has been added to the list.

cmd_removed.info: Reply if the command has been removed from the list.

args_info.<COMMAND>: Command that has been removed to the list.

cmd_not_found.info: Reply if someone tries to remove a command that is not on the list.

args_info.<COMMAND>: Command that should be removed from the list.

args_info.<EMOTE>: Emote that user wants to get information about.
args_info.<AMOUNT>: Total amount of emotes posted in this channel.

minute_reply.info: Reply for emotes per minute count. ('!minute <EMOTE>')

args_info.<EMOTE>: Emote that user wants to get information about.
args_info.<AMOUNT>: Amount of emotes posted in the last minute in this channel.

not_found.info: Reply if user specified a quote number that is not in the list.

wrong_input.info: Reply if user uses wrong kind of input for '!quote <NUMBER>'.

quote_added.info: Reply if a quote has been added. ('!addquote <QUOTE>')

quote_exists.msg: Quote is already in the list. :thinking:
quote_exists.info: Reply if user tries to add a quote that's already in the list.

quote_removed.info: Reply if a quote has been deleted. ('!delquote <QUOTE>')

quote_not_found.info: Reply if user tries to remove a quote that's not in the list.

div_by_zero.msg: @<USER> AjhHdjsTmab beep boop can_not-Calcuasdjnasjd---SHUTTING DOWN....... Just kidding 4Head
div_by_zero.info: Reply if user tries to devide by zero.

number_overflow.info: Reply if the calculation yields a too large number.

wrong_input.info: Reply if wrong input in '!calc' command.

default_error.info: Reply if the calculation expression can't be executed by the function.

args_info.<EXPRESSION>: Calculation expression that can't be executed.

block_activate.info: Write message if PyramidBlock gets activated.

block_already_on.info: Write message if user tries to activate PyramidBlock while it's already on.

block_deactivate.info: Write message if PyramidBlock gets deactivated.

block_already_off.info: Write message if user tries to deactivate PyramidBlock while it's not on.

msg: A pyramid (from Greek: πυραμίς pyramis)[1][2] is a structure whose outer surfaces are triangular and converge to a single point at the top, making the shape roughly a pyramid in the geometric sense.
Sorry, did I interrupt you? monkaS
pyramidblocks.info: Pyramid block messages while PyramidBlock is on.

plebpyramid.msg: Wow, <USER> built a pleb pyramid and <PRONOUN0> gets a free timeout. 4Head
plebpyramid.info: Write message if a user completes a 3-part pyramid and gets timed-out.

mod_plebpyramid.msg: <USER> created a pleb pyramid and would get a free timeout, but <PRONOUN0> is a mod. FeelsBadMan
mod_plebpyramid.info: Write message if a channel moderator completes a 3-part pyramid.

multi_plebpyramid.msg: Wow, <MULTIUSERS> built a pleb pyramid and they all get a free timeout. 4Head
multi_plebpyramid.info: Write message if multiple users complete a 3-part pyramid and get timed-out.

args_info.<MULTIUSERS>: Users who built the pyramid together.

pyramid.msg: <USER> built a pyramid and <PRONOUN0> gets <AMOUNT> spam points. PogChamp
pyramid.info: Write message if a user completes a 5-part pyramid and gets points as reward.

args_info.<AMOUNT>: Amount of points the user gets for completing the pyramid.

multi_pyramid.msg: Teamwork! PogChamp <MULTIUSERS> built a pyramid. They get <AMOUNT> spam points. KappaClaus
multi_pyramid.info: Write message if multiple users complete a 5-part pyramid and get points as reward.

args_info.<MULTIUSERS>: Users who built the pyramid together.
args_info.<AMOUNT>: Amount of points the user gets for completing the pyramid.

start_msg.msg: /me ▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬ஜ۩۞۩ஜ▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬ Kappa game has started. Guess the right amount of Kappa s between 1 and 25! PogChamp ▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬
start_msg.info: Announce the start of the KappaGame.

stop_msg.info: Write message if the KappaGame gets canceled.

winner_msg.msg: /me <USER> got it! It was <AMOUNT> Kappa s!
winner_msg.info: Write message if a user wins the Kappa game and gets points as reward.

args_info.<AMOUNT>: Right amount of Kappa's to win the game.

wrong_amount.info: Write the message if user guesses the wrong amount of Kappas.

args_info.<AMOUNT>: Wrong amount of Kappa's input by the user.

start_msg.msg: /me The 'Guess The Emote Game' has started. Write one of the following emotes to start playing: <MULTIEMOTES>
start_msg.info: Announce the start of the GuessEmoteGame.

stop_msg.info: Write message if the GuessEmoteGame gets canceled.

winner_msg.msg: /me <USER> got it! It was <EMOTE> . <PRONOUN0> gets <AMOUNT> spam points.
winner_msg.info: Write message if a user wins the GuessEmoteGame and gets points as reward.

args_info.<EMOTE>: Right emote to win the GuessEmoteGame
args_info.<AMOUNT>: Amount of points the user gets for winning the game.

emote_msg.info: Reply possible emotes for the game on '!emotes' command while the game is running.

clue_stat.info: Give clue about the class of the card.

clue_set.msg: /me The card is from the <STAT> set.
clue_set.info: Give clue from which set the card is from.

args_info.<STAT>: The set in which the card was released.

clue_letter.msg: /me The name of the card starts with '<STAT>'.
clue_letter.info: Give the first letter of the minion's name as clue.

args_info.<STAT>: The first letter of the name of the minion.

clue_rarity.info: Give clue about the rarity of the card.

clue_attackpower.info: Give clue about the attackpower of the minion.

clue_manacost.info: Give clue about the manacosts of the minion.

clue_healthpoints.info: Give clue about the healthpoints of the minion.

start_msg.msg: /me ▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬ஜ۩۞۩ஜ▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬ The 'Guess The Minion Game' has started. Type minion names to play. monkaS ▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬
start_msg.info: Announce the start of the GuessMinionGame.

stop_msg.info: Write message if the GuessMinionGame gets canceled.

winner_msg.msg: /me <USER> got it! It was <MINION>. <PRONOUN0> gets <AMOUNT> spam points.
winner_msg.info: Write message if a user wins the GuessMinionGame and gets points as reward.

args_info.<MINION>: Right minion name to win the GuessMinionGame
args_info.<AMOUNT>: Amount of points the user gets for winning the game.

notifications_already_on.info: Write message if user tries to activate Notifications while they are already on.

notifications_deactivate.info: Write message if Notifications get deactivated.

notifications_already_off.info: Write message if user tries to deactivate Notifications while they're not on.

notification_added.info: Reply if a notification has been added. ('!addnotification <NOTIFICATION>')

notification_removed.info: Reply if a notification has been deleted. ('!delnotification <NOTIFICATION>')

notification_not_found.info: Reply if user tries to remove a notification that's not in the list.

user_not_found.info: Message for !rank then input a person that can't be found

bot_activate.info: Display message when bot gets activated.

fail.info: Display message when mods want to got banned
